prompts: A serene sunrise over a calm ocean, golden light breaking through clouds, gentle waves lapping at a sandy beach, warm orange and pink hues painting the sky, peaceful morning atmosphere.
The sun rises higher, revealing a lone surfer walking towards the water carrying a surfboard, beach stretching into the distance, seagulls flying overhead, morning mist clearing.
The surfer paddles out into the ocean on their board, small waves rolling beneath them, the sunrise behind creating a silhouette effect, determination in their posture.
The surfer catches the wave and stands up on the board, riding along the curling water, spray flying around them, perfect form and balance, exhilarating motion.
The surfer steps off their board in shallow water, waves swirling around their ankles, carrying the board under their arm, satisfied expression.
Wide shot of the beach scene at golden hour, surfer as a small figure, the vast ocean stretching to the horizon, nature's beauty in its full glory.
